column1: Food Quality and Safety with Industrial Practise - MSc
column5: The quality and safety of our food are vitally important in ensuring we have edible, nourishing and varied options at all price points. With changes to UK food and drink processing laws in the wake of Brexit, the industry must continue to maintain the highest standards.This brand-new Food Quality and Safety with Industrial Practise MSc will provide you with:
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: 1 Year Full Time / 2 Years Part Time
